articles.description: The shares of GPT Healthcare debuted with a 15% premium over the issue price on Thursday, which was slightly above expectations. Most analysts priced in a 9-10% premium listing.

articles.title: Honda Elevate now available through CSD outlets - CarWale
articles.description: Honda Cars India Ltd. (HCIL) has announced that the Elevate will now be sold through the Canteen Stores Department (CSD). It will be offered at an exclusive price for the armed forces personnel, ex-servicemen, and their families.

- Honda City and Amaze are also available
